mx_desc: Resolve MX records, priority, relay/direct delivery, and A/AAAA match.
spf_desc: Retrieve SPF from TXT record; analyze mechanism count, include depth, and policy strength.
dkim_desc: Query selector._domainkey for public keys; supports multiple selectors (comma-separated).
dmarc_desc: Fetch _dmarc record and parse policy (p/sp), alignment (a=), and report addresses (rua/ruf).
ports_input_placeholder: Optional: specify host (defaults to MX target)
tls_desc: Check handshake protocol version, certificate chain, weak ciphers, and STARTTLS support.
dnsbl_desc: Test common DNSBLs for blacklist entries; supports IPv4 and IPv6.
ptr_desc: Retrieve PTR for outbound IP and verify against HELO/EHLO.
